#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define test() int t;scanf("%d",&t);for(int tno=1;tno<=t;tno++)

#define loop(i, begin, end) for (i = (begin) - ((begin) > (end)); i != (end) - ((begin) > (end)); i += 1 - 2 * ((begin) > (end)))
//Works for forward as well as backward iteration

#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define wl(n) while(n--)
#define fi first
#define se second
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end() //eg sort(all(v));

typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long llu;
typedef double Lf;
typedef vector<int> vi; 
typedef vector< vi > vvi; 
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef pair<int,pair<int,int> > piii ;

#define sz(a) int((a).size())
#define ini(a,v) memset(a,v,sizeof(a))


// Input Output
#define sc(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sc2(n,m) sc(n), sc(m)
#define scs(s) scanf("%s",s);
#define pd(n) printf("%d",n)

#define scl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define scl2(n,m) scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m)
#define pdl(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define newln printf("\n")
#define space printf(" ")

//Bitwise
#define chkbit(s, b)    (s & ((ll)1<<b))
#define setbit(s, b)    (s |= ((ll)1<<b))
#define clrbit(s, b)    (s &= ~(1<<b))

//constants
#define MOD 1000000007
#define inf ((1<<29)-1)
#define linf ((1LL<<63)-1)
const double eps = 1e-9;

//Error check
#define debug() 			printf("here\n")
#define printvec(v)       	{ for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++) printf("%d ",v[i]);printf("\n"); }
#define printarr(a,st,ed)     { for(int i=st;i<ed;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]);printf("\n"); }  
#define chk(a) cerr << endl << #a << " : " << a << endl
#define chk2(a,b) cerr << endl << #a << " : " << a << "\t" << #b << " : " << b << endl

//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#define MAX 100009

int a[MAX]={0};

int main()
{
	int i,j,k;
	test(){
		int n;
	sc(n);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		sc(a[i]);
	}
	sort(a,a+n);
	printf("Case %d: %d\n",tno,a[n-1]+a[n-2]+a[n-3] );
	}
	return 0;
}
